Html:
Hi,

I have Downloaded Demo.Windows.Forms, and i have modified as per my requirement.

Its working well with XP, Server 2003.

But it is not working with Vista and Server 2008.

Can u help me in this regard.

 

Thanks & Regards

Suresh

Hi,

Thanks for a great tool. You have been a life saver.

I also have the same problem as tharigondasuresh. I could run well on XP.

I have followed the instructions on changing configuration for 64 bit, but I have not been able to run on Vista.

Best Regards,

Kam

Hi Radioman,

Thanks for your quick response. I'll try again then over the weekend.

But from experience what are the key issues to look for?

Thanks,

Kam
the key is: 32bit sqlite doest work in x64 system when build target is AnyCPU or x64, you need x64 sqlite or change target to x86

Hi Radioman,

I used the sqlite in the folder \References\Windows\x64.

Its now working great.

Thank you, thank you.

Kam
